bill_title: to exempt certain agricultural equipment from motor vehicle registration and licensing requirements.
keywords: Motor Vehicle Registration, License Plates & Fees

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain agricultural equipment from motor vehicle registration and licensing requirements. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-5-1.3 be amended to read as follows: 32-5-1.3. Any farm wagon, farm implement drawn by another vehicle , or farm vehicle which is designed and used primarily for tillage, harvesting , or transportation of agricultural products or farm property by or for agricultural producers is exempt from the provisions of this chapter unless the farm vehicle is a stock trailer, gooseneck trailer , or semitrailer towed by a licensed motor vehicle on any public highway or a passenger vehicle, two- or three-axle truck , or semitractor. Any trailer or self-propelled unit that is designed for the transporting of hay and is only incidentally moved or operated on the public highways is exempt from the provisions of this chapter regardless of whether the trailer or unit is pulled by a farm vehicle, semitractor, or other licensed motor vehicle. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
